title: Weeping Woke & Grokking Gnostic
description:
Wokism as Transhumanism, all euphemizing antinatalism all over the place. Missing screen-induced dissociation like fish that can't see water, PVK goes over some Keith Woods guy's vidya. I scrape out the good bits and toss up some responses and 'also for your consideration' clips.

Had to do it in LightWorks, so there's a resolution downgrade.

Music - /watch?v=1fgzX2XiATQ

Main Source PVK - /watch?v=jSRmHqzB6Ew
Lindsay - /watch?v=jSRmHqzB6Ew
4 years ago - /watch?v=v-hIVnmUdXM
Last Week - /watch?v=rWAEq7TInO0
Tom with the Weather - /watch?v=rhzJAStIqfk
BoM Pageau - /watch?v=skFONbc-1HQ
Astrology - /watch?v=52hVgs5ykFc
Galaxy - /watch?v=3VwDwvlSJRk
Gnosis - /watch?v=GtyeADxttD0

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p

Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me:
https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz
